name.baseName: Lamb (including lamb carcass) ; Live sheep ; Semi-mechanized slaughtering ; less than 1500 pcs/d; NESPS2
羊肉（含羊胴肉） ; 活羊 ; 半机械化屠宰 ; 小于1500只/天 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh) / (rated power of treatment facilities (kW) × operating hours of treatment facilities (hours))

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh) / (rated power of treatment facilities (kW) × operating hours of treatment facilities (hours))
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集代表每天少于1500只的活羊（包含羊胴肉）半机械化屠宰过程。所包含的末端处理（EoP）技术，如化粪池、沉淀分离、SBR（序批式反应器）、厌氧水解、生物接触氧化、化学混凝和厌氧生物处理用于处理废水并在排放到环境之前减少化学需氧量（COD）、氨氮、总磷和有机结合氮等污染物。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码1351文件，在完整版文件中第2544页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
nan
源文件中描述为为活羊，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPrecipitation separation + anaerobic hydrolysis + bio-contact oxidation process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh) / (rated power of treatment facilities (kW) × operating hours of treatment facilities (hours))
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是沉淀分离+厌氧水解类+生物接触氧化法，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/污水治理设施总功率（千瓦）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPrecipitation separation + anaerobic hydrolysis + bio-contact oxidation process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh) / (rated power of treatment facilities (kW) × operating hours of treatment facilities (hours))
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是沉淀分离+厌氧水解类+生物接触氧化法，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/污水治理设施总功率（千瓦）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisChemical coagulation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management40，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh) / (rated power of treatment facilities (kW) × operating hours of treatment facilities (hours))
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是化学混凝法，其效率为40，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/污水治理设施总功率（千瓦）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPrecipitation separation + SBR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management40
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是沉淀分离+SBR类，其效率为40，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/污水治理设施总功率（千瓦）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPrecipitation separation + anaerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management20，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh) / (rated power of treatment facilities (kW) × operating hours of treatment facilities (hours))
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是沉淀分离+厌氧生物处理法，其效率为20，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/污水治理设施总功率（千瓦）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是沉淀分离，其效率为10，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=1。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
